processingCommand.script:
REM force inheritance of Task variables
REM Keep the task events tidy
REM Job History aborted, event wait and completed
REM "${UXEXE}\uxpur" CTL TSK=T_XT_GEN_SETBUSDATE_HEADER UPR=U_XT* MU=${S_CODUG} STATUS=AWT
REM Job History Time Overrun
REM "${UXEXE}\UXDLT" FLA TSK=T_XT_GEN_SETBUSDATE_HEADER UPR=U_XT* MU=${S_CODUG} STATUS=O nseq=*
set resexe=0
exit %resexe%
